DRAG FORCE SIMULATOR

Quadratic Drag Ball Simulation

This interactive simulation shows the motion of a falling object under gravity and quadratic air drag. Adjust parameters like mass, drag coefficient, and air density to see how they affect the motion, trajectory, and terminal velocity. The system also displays the relevant differential equations and Lagrangian formulation step-by-step. Please watch the attached video to learn more about Lagrangian Mechanics and how you can exploit it to your own benefit.
